payload.title: Add syncStatus field to gitgov context command output
payload.description:
Enrich 'gitgov context' command to include syncStatus field from .session.json

## Context
The 'gitgov context' command currently shows working context (cycle, task, actor, branch, session) but doesn't include sync status information.

## Goal
Add syncStatus field to context output for easier access to sync state without needing to manually parse .session.json.

## Implementation
1. Update ContextCommand.execute() to read actorState.syncStatus from session
2. Add syncStatus to output object (both text and JSON formats)
3. Optionally add dashboardActive flag (check if Dashboard process is running)

## Expected Output
```
$ gitgov context

Current Cycle: 1763344302-cycle-epic
Current Task: 1763344387-task-update-protocol
Current Actor: human:camilo
Current Branch: feature/task-1763344387
Session: active

Sync Status:
  • Last push: 2h ago
  • Last pull: 4h ago
  • Status: pending
  • Watchers: active
```

## References
- packages/cli/src/commands/context/context-command.ts
- packages/blueprints/03_products/protocol/99_appendices/session_state.md (syncStatus definition)
- packages/blueprints/03_products/epics/collaboration_system/roadmap.md § 3 (Actor-Specific Sync Status)
